client-settings.name: 株式会社ジェイトリップ

extension-param.param-value: style: #site-translate-header-wrapper{width:auto!important;} *{letter-spacing:normal!important; white-space: normal!important;}#search .ui-tabs-panel div.png,#topics ul,.btn a,.lineup .detail,.lineup .month{height:auto}#search div.png ul li .hd{width:auto}#featureSp p{font-size:90%;line-height:normal;padding:0 10px 0 0}#topArea #depa .hd a{top:25px;right:5px;z-index:1}#main #depa .hd a{top:14px;right:5px;z-index:1}#topArea #depa .select{margin:10px 0 0} :not(.mobile) #footer .nav_f ul{padding:0}#depa .pull ul li.other ul li:nth-child(2n){width:100%}#btn-search input#submit,.btn a{width:auto;padding:2% 4%;font-size: 80%;}#depa .hd{line-height:normal;font-size:60%}#depa p.active{font-size:80%}#feature ul{height:auto}#hotellist .hotellist01{width:307px}#hotellist .hotellist02{width:374px}#hotellist div{vertical-align:top}#wrap-recommend li{width:196px;height:auto;float:none;display:inline-block;vertical-align:top}.rankinglist .wrap li{height:auto}.rankinglist .wrap .price{position:relative;white-space:normal}#wrap-theme ul li a{display:inline-block}.modelTop_item{height:auto}.modelTop_item_title{width:60%}#wrap-recommend .period{position:relative; left:0;}#wrap-best10 .price{position:relative;white-space:normal}#wrap-best10 li,#wrap-places li{float:none;display:inline-block;height:auto;vertical-align:top}#wrap-places li{width:135px;padding:11px 0 0 88px;border-bottom:0;border-top:1px dotted #bbb}#areahd2 .hd{width:auto}#areahd2 .txt{width:500px;float:right}.lineup .access{position:relative;margin:3% 0}.modelTop_item_label{width:auto;margin-bottom:2%}.sidebarList-text_item{height:auto}.purposeTop_item{font-size:70%;padding-left:10px}.areaListTop_item a{height:auto}#areaselect .txt{width:auto;bottom:0;position:relative}#lineup ul li{float:none;display:inline-block;height:auto}.en #block-search ul.sItems li .hd{width:auto} .en #search div.png ul.conditions li {width:auto; float:none;} .en #block-search ul.sItems li .cont {padding: 0;} .en #block-search ul.sItems li{float:none;width:auto}.en #lineupheader .h3p{width:auto;margin:-28px 10px 0 470px} #tyo.en #lineupheader .h3p{width:auto;margin:-35px 0 0 500px;} .en #search-form ul.sItems li .hd{min-width:200px;width:auto}.en #search-form ul.sItems li .cont{margin:0 0 0 90pt} .en #copy{clear:both; }.mobile .en #search-form ul.sItems li .hd{width:100%} .en #pickup li, #featurepickup li { height: 135px; } #tabimeister .price, .areatopplan .price { margin: 0 0 18px 0; } #wrap-places .title {height:auto;} .en #block-reserve span.w100 a {font-size: 11px;} .mobile #search div.png ul li .cont {padding: 0;} #search .mobile div.png ul li .hd {float: none;} .mobile #search div.png ul li .hd,.mobile .en #block-search ul.sItems li .hd { width: 100%; } .mobile #topArea #depa .hd { line-height: 1.2;} .mobile #wrap-recommend li {width: auto;} :not(#toppage) #spMenu ul.menu li a, :not(#toppage) #spMenu ul.menu li span { height: auto;line-height: normal; } .mobile #block-information li { font-size: 13px; } #tyo #header #depanav dd #area_tyo, #osa #header #depanav dd #area_osa, #chu #header #depanav dd #area_chu, #fkk #header #depanav dd #area_fkk, #cts #header #depanav dd #area_spk, #koj #header #depanav dd #area_koj, #kmj #header #depanav dd #area_kmj, #kmi #header #depanav dd #area_kmi, #tak #header #depanav dd #area_tak { height: 50px; } #block-information li { float: none; width: auto; } .mobile #block-search ul.sItems li .hd2 { width: 100%; height: auto; } #nav_f-sp li { width: auto; } #block-choice-best5 .bx-wrapper, #block-best10 .bx-wrapper{height:auto;} /* jdive */ #wrapper #right .search .middle, #wrapper #right .search {height:auto;} #wrapper #right #license2 .category .exlist li {float: none;display: inline-block;width: 46%;vertical-align: top;} .mobile #wrapper #right #license2 .category .exlist li {width: 100%;} #anchormenu li {padding-top: 0;} #wrapper #right #read h3 {font-size: 90%;} #wrapper #right #read p {font-size: 80%;line-height: 1.2;} #wrapper #right #area .island .textarea p, #wrapper #right #area .island .textarea h4 { line-height: normal;font-size: 100%; } #wrapper #right #arearead h3 {font-size: 12px; line-height: normal;} #block-best10.rankinglist .wrap li { height: auto; } #tabimeister .cassette, .areatopplan .cassette {padding: 7px 0; line-height: 1.3;} :not(.mobile) .en #pankuzu_f {padding: 24px 0 3px 43px; margin: 0 0 0 22px;} :not(.mobile) #toppage.en #pankuzu_f {padding: 24px 0 23px 93px;} :not(.mobile) .en #footer .nav_f {line-height: 1.1;margin: 0 0 0 22px;} #hotellist b { font-size: 12px; } .en #hotellist .hd a { top: -10px; } #wrap-ama #main #right #ama .info {height: auto;padding: 0 0 10px;} #right .h3p {font-size: 90%;} #wrap-jwalker_index .item ul.icon { top: inherit; bottom: 0 !important; } #block-reserve span.check a b { padding: 0 22px; } #tabimeister .img, .areatopplan .img { top:25px; } .lineup .copy {width: 85%;} #block-sp { margin-top: 170px; } /* jdive */ #wrapper #right #main .tour li {float:none; display: inline-block;vertical-align: top;width: 310px;} .into2 { padding: 0 35px 10px 30px;font-size: 95%; } #flow .into .list li.timeline { top: 444px; } .als-text-title_item {width: 388px;line-height: 1.2em;padding: 0;font-size: 90%;left: 45px;} .als-text-hdr{width: 408px;} .footer .topic-keyword p {margin-top: 0; line-height: 1.3;} #room p, #facilities p { height: auto; }
